data.name: Kawaii Neko Girls 2
data.detailed_description:
Kawaii Neko Gilrs 2 — It's a relaxing anime puzzles game with cute kawaii neko girls. Solve puzzles and collect full images. Enjoy high quality artwork.

Dive into beautiful world of Kawaii Neko Girls. Enjoy a wonderful arts in 4K resolution.

Game features

  • Cute kawaii neko girls
  • Adult mode
  • NSFW
  • Gallery
  • Tips
  • Relaxing music
  • Achievements
  • Useful hotkeys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
